nodes.text: Battle of the Exodeen system  (Mandalorian Wars)

In their pursuit of a plan called Mandalorian Triumph, a charge to take the planet of Duro, Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders enmeshed in the Mandalorian Wars with the Galactic Republic attacked the Exodeen system in the Colonies in 3962 BBY. Coming off a victory at the Quellor system, the Mandalorians won on Exodeen and then moved on to Duro, which they successfully captured.
The battle in the Exodeen system was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry.
